title: Keeping Casey
description: Casey Preston is the guy with the plan. The list-maker. The one who micromanages his own life.Spontaneously offering to be his best friend’s fake boyfriend to get Ethan’s annoying team captain off his back?That’s not thinking things through. It’s not even smart given Casey’s been fighting his feelings for Ethan for years.Ethan Rain just wants to play hockey and get his college degree. Adding a fake boyfriend to the mix? He doesn’t need that complication.If Casey were his real boyfriend, though? If he got to keep Casey forever? Now we’re talking.But what if Casey doesn’t want to be kept?
author: Amy Aislin
